meanings.sent1: The park was full of nonskaters enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: The nonskaters watched as the skaters performed tricks on the ice.
meanings.sent3: The nonskaters joked about trying to skate and falling on their faces.
meanings.sent4: In a world of skaters, the nonskaters were the ones standing on solid ground.
meanings.sent5: The nonskaters preferred to walk around the rink rather than risk slipping on the ice.

meanings.definition: Those who are not skilled in skating.
meanings.sent1: The competition was fierce among the skaters, leaving the nonskaters in awe.
meanings.sent2: The nonskaters stumbled and wobbled on the ice, trying to keep their balance.
meanings.sent3: The nonskaters attempted a few moves on the ice, but it was clear they needed more practice.
meanings.sent4: While the skaters glided effortlessly, the nonskaters struggled to stay upright.
meanings.sent5: The nonskaters admired the grace and agility of the skilled skaters.
